label: ProductionProcess
comment: A naturally occurring or designed sequence of operations or events in order to produce something.

datatypeProperties.comment: A textual or coded description, such as a remark or additional information.
A machine allocated to this production process.
A production device allocated to this production process.
The evaluation of an object, such as a product, process, or organization, with respect to the object's worth or condition.
An act of notification by formal documentation or action, in any form prescribed or accepted, such as a self-declaration.
An unattractive or unsatisfactory characteristic.
A permit from an authority to own or use something, do a particular thing, or to conduct a trade.
A specified feature that is fixed for the case in question but may be different in other cases.
A specified period of time.
A specified production cycle applicable to this production process.
A document issued by a government, public organization or association to certify a property of a person, entity, process or object.
A chemical treatment applied during this production process.
A method or substance, such as chemical fertilizers and crop protection products, applied to plant growth whilst managing and controlling diseases and pests.
A product finishing treatment applied during this production process.
A referenced norm or requirement that establishes uniform criteria, methods, processes and practices, such as in engineering or technical areas.
The indication of whether or not this production process is critical.
A code specifying a disclosure level for this production process.
The indication of whether or not this production process is a final one.
An input batch applicable to this production machine.
A substance from which something is or could be made.
An input product applicable to this facility production unit.
The code specifying the inventory type for this production process.
A significant occurrence or happening in a supply chain.
The code specifying the operation reference for this production process.
The code specifying the operation technology for this production process.
An output batch applicable to this specified production device.
A substance from which something is or could be made.
An output product applicable to this facility production unit.
A distinct operation or task that is part of a process.
The indication of whether or not this is a recycling production process.
A specified computer file or program stored in a binary format.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
A production facility specified for this production process.
The process of certifying organizational performance or qualification requirements as stipulated in regulations.
The process of certifying that a process has met performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements.
The process of certifying that a certain product batch has passed performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in regulations.
The process of certifying that a certain product has passed performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in regulations.
The code specifying the step in this production process.
A subcontractor for this trade party.
A subordinate process of this production process.

referencedBy.comment: A process applicable to this specified production cycle.
A production process provided by this trade party.
A production process specified for this product batch.
A subordinate process of this production process.
